question: Why do you want to be a Hospitality Team member on the Atlas Network?
What sets you apart from the other applicants to this position?
How active can you be on the server?
How long have you been on the Atlas Network?
Do you have any experience with helping people out in chat or lobby sitting?

How would you react and work in a situation where a lot of newbie players are asking you simple and repetitive questions? (Such as about a release date for a new gamemode, the server being down or a simple game feature)
Do you know all the commands in Skyblock Sandbox that are used on a daily basis? If so, explain how to get coins, get items, edit an item, add a lore, add an enchant, and use the auction house.
How would you make Atlas a better place in your opinion?
Do you have any aspirations of becoming a staff member of Atlas in the future?
